Name Rascalopedia
Synopsis Overview of important terms and concepts.
Details Contents AbstractDataType AbstractSyntaxTree Compiler DomainSpecificLanguage DynamicSemantics Grammar Interpreter Language LanguageDefinition List MetaProgramming Parser ParseTree Prettyprinter Refactoring Relation Scope Set SoftwareEngineering SoftwareEvolution SoftwareMetric StaticSemantics Syntax Testing Tuple Typechecker Visualization
Description Rascalopedia gives a quick overview of the most important terms and concepts that are relevant for metaprogrammers in general and metaprogrammers using Rascal in particular.

Rascalopedia is work in progress. Please add your suggestions for new concepts below in the discussion section.

Is this page unclear, or have you spotted an error? Please add a comment below and help us to improve it. For all other questions and remarks, visit ask.rascal-mpl.org.
